title: Zachariayude Garbhinikal
description: A gynecologist caring for four unconventional patients receives a visit from a young woman who presents him and his wife with a blessing in disguise.
actors: Lal, Geetha, Aju Varghese, Rima Kallingal

title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
description: Zack and Miri make and star in an adult film to bring in easy money. But their unspoken feelings for each other might threaten the whole enterprise.
actors: Seth Rogen, Elizabeth Banks, Craig Robinson, Jason Mewes

title: Zapped
description: A girl discovers a dog-training app that can get boys to obey her every command. But she soon learns that it isn't the cure-all she had hoped for.
actors: Zendaya, Chanelle Peloso, Spencer Boldman, Emilia McCarthy

title: Zenda
description: A change in the leadership of a political party sparks bitter conflict and the party's division into two rival factions.
actors: Santosh Juvekar, Siddharth Chandekar, Sachit Patil, Chinmay Mandlekar

title: Zenne Dancer
description: In this fact-based tale, gay Ahmet is inspired by a male belly dancer and a naive lover to come out to his conservative family, with tragic results.
actors: Kerem Can, Giovanni Arvaneh, Erkan Avcı, Rüçhan Çalışkur

title: Zila Ghaziabad
description: Simmering tensions between two rival gangs in Ghaziabad are further ignited by the arrival of a crazy, hard-as-nails police official.
actors: Sanjay Dutt, Vivek Oberoi, Arshad Warsi, Paresh Rawal

title: Zindagi Kitni Haseen Hay
description: Two young parents struggle to keep their marriage afloat and their son protected amidst financial woes, career goals and clashes of ego.
actors: Feroze Khan, Sajal Ali, Jibrayl Ahmed Rajput, Alyy Khan

title: Zinzana
description: Recovering alcoholic Talal wakes up inside a small-town police station cell, where he's subject to the mind games of a psychotic sadist.
actors: Ali Suliman, Saleh Bakri, Yasa, Ali Al-Jabri

title: Zion
description: Born without legs and stuck in foster care for years, teen Zion Clark finds his calling when he pursues competitive wrestling. A documentary short.

title: Zip & Zap and the Marble Gang
description: Inspired by a popular 1950s comic strip, this youthful comedy records the exploits of pals Zip and Zap, after both are sent to a strict new school.
actors: Javier Gutiérrez, Daniel Cerezo, Raúl Rivas, Claudia Vega

title: Zipi & Zape y la Isla del Capitan
description: At Christmas, Zip and Zap take a trip with their parents to a remote island, where a friendly woman runs a children's home and mystery awaits.
actors: Teo Planell, Toni Gómez, Elena Anaya, Iria Castellano

title: Zipper
description: A star prosecutor puts his family and promising political career on the line as he develops an obsession with high-end escorts.
actors: Patrick Wilson, Dianna Agron, Lena Headey, Richard Dreyfuss

title: Zokkomon
description: When his cruel uncle abandons him, a young orphan learns to access the untapped superpowers that have been waiting within him all along.
actors: Darsheel Safary, Anupam Kher, Manjari Fadnis, Tinnu Anand

title: Zoo
description: A drug dealer starts having doubts about his trade as his brother, his client, and two rappers from the slums each battle their own secret addictions.
actors: Shashank Arora, Shweta Tripathi, Rahul Kumar, Gopal K. Singh

title: Zoom
description: Comic book artist Emma draws her ideal man: Edward, the director of a film about a novelist named Michelle, who's writing a book about Emma.
actors: Gael García Bernal, Alison Pill, Mariana Ximenes, Jason Priestley
